item.title: Is there inequality in Kensington and Chelsea?
item.author: Fatima Iftikhar,
item.description: You may or may not have seen that Imperial Hub recently ran a social action #Resolution campaign. Well, a couple of weeks ago we were all over campus asking people to come up with a resolution for how they will contribute to making the world a better place in 2015. On the Monday I was running a â€¦
